name: Rigged Control
description:
Humanity, is at inter-galactic war.

An invading species threatens to destroy the planet and wipe out humanity for good, and things aren't looking well for them, with multiple failed attacks and lost battles. The humans are outnumbered.

But there is hope. Using the broken parts and wreckage of the few "bugs" humanity has managed to shoot down, they have now created a new type of battleship, capable of hacking into nearby enemy ships and take control of their weapons systems.

But as humanity will soon find out, they don't have full control, and their weapons systems, along with their enemies', will instead be joined together...

-- Controls --

A = move left     |     D = move right    |    Spacebar = shoot

Left-Stick = move left     |     Left-Stick = move right    |    A/B/X = shoot
